### About this site

This website was made in accordance to Homework 4 Instructions as decreed by Professor Jeff Goldsmith through his [p8105.com website](p8105.com).
[R Studio Version 1.1.456](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/), was used to build and knit the personal website. 
The site and its source code is hosted on [Github](https://github.com/noshame11/TheAccidentalLoverofaDataScientist.github.io).
